Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product. This offers a fair compromise between the perceived value to you and my desired selling price. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
